column3: str
This elderly private needs help finding someone.
Speak with the soldiers at Castrum Oriens.
Speak with the serpent recruit.
Sorry to bother you, but would you mind helping me look for my daughter? She headed off in the direction of Castrum Oriens quite a while ago and should've been back by now.
Would you mind asking the Alliance soldiers there if they've seen her?
She has blonde hair and brown eyes. Last I heard she had been dispatched to fight at Baelsar's Wall. Please, bring her back to me!
She has blonde hair and brown eyes. Last I heard she had been dispatched to fight at Baelsar's Wall. Please, bring her back to me!

Ah, <Clickable(<If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><Sheet(GCRankLimsaMaleText,PlayerParameter(52),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><Sheet(GCRankGridaniaMaleText,PlayerParameter(53),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))><Sheet(GCRankUldahMaleText,PlayerParameter(54),8)/><Else/></If>)/> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>! To what do we owe the pleasure?
Hmm, I cannot say anyone here matches that description. That said, I do faintly recall hearing of a gentleman searching for such a lady in the past.
It may be worth your while asking some of my subordinates if they know aught.
A blonde female soldier? Sorry, no one comes to mind.
I've seen a Miqo'te that matches that description, but no Hyurs.
Cannot say I have seen anyone like that around here. You may have better luck asking a member of the Order of the Twin Adder. This is their post after all.
It may be worth your while asking some of my subordinates if they know aught.
A blonde female soldier? Sorry, no one comes to mind.
I've seen a Miqo'te that matches that description, but no Hyurs.
Cannot say I have seen anyone like that around here. You may have better luck asking a member of the Order of the Twin Adder. This is their post after all.
Wait, did you just say you were asked to search for this woman by an elderly private?
Losing a loved one is never easy, but it really is about time he accepted reality. His daughter has been dead for a while now.
She was seduced by the Griffin's words and joined his forces in the battle at Baelsar's Wall. It was there she breathed her last.
We confirmed as much when we showed her belongings to her father.
However, it seems the shock was too much for him. He has repeatedly visited us since, requesting every time that we look for his daughter.
I will speak with him once more and make sure this does not happen again. My apologies for him sending you on a wild goose chase.
